Flow.description: This flow is used to perform update operations on client contact. [Suraj Kumar 04-10-2023]: Removed Auto-approval for DS Team. [Suraj Kumar 18-10-2023]: Added custom error message for all DMLs and actions in fault path. [Suraj Kumar 03-06-2024] : Added null check before deleting "Segment Leaders" in contact team.
Flow.label: Client Contact | Update Operations

scheduledPaths.name: Notification_to_Client_Contact_Relationship_Team
scheduledPaths.label: Notification to Client Contact Relationship Team

textTemplates.name: NotificationBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear Contact relationship team,
This is to remind you that your client contact, {!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName}'s birthday is tomorrow. Please remember to wish him/her and maintain a healthy relationship.
Best Regards, Linkreta

textTemplates.name: notificationSurveyUpdate
textTemplates.text: The Survey Score is updated on Client Contact {!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName}. NPS : {!$Record.Net_Promoter_Score__c}, CSI : {!$Record.Customer_Satisfaction_Index__c}, CXI : {!$Record.Customer_Experience_Index__c}

textTemplates.name: NotitficationBodyToPickRecord
textTemplates.text:
Dear DS Team,
A contact "{!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName}" is created in the system and ready to be picked by you.
Best Regards, Linkreta
